I'm Josh and I'm a Designer focused on Branding and UI/UX

Currently, I am working in San Francisco as a Designer at @shopify where I am helping build the perfect virtual employee for their @kitcrm team. You can find me on Twitter at @jawsmartin.

Posts

  • 08/15/2016 Convulsive Decluttering
  • 07/01/2016 Five Pivots
  • 10/20/2015 Phil the Pigeon
  • 12/15/2014 The Perfect News Website

About

I work primarily with development teams, creating wireframes, high-fidelity mockups, prototypes, UI kits, and brand assets/style guides for web and mobile products. When needed, I also assist in front-end development: HTML5, CSS3/SASS, and Javascript.

I have a passion for branding and it greatly influences my work. I believe a successful product is one that communicates it's identity through disciplined visuals and clear, concerted content.

While I care deeply for a beautiful, brand-driven product, usability and functionality are very important to me. I would gladly spend 90% of my time solving for user-stories before I opened a single Adobe program.

I would describe my design style as boring and developer-friendly: I love carefully chosen typography, precise layouts, and understated flourishes. A comment-heavy, dry-as-bone stylesheet is my favorite.

Background

I completed my B.F.A in 'Applied Media', with a concentration in corporate branding and identity, at the Edinboro University of Pennsylvania. I am a self-taught web developer and designer.

In addition to various contract work, I've worked as a Front-End Developer for @power2switch, Lead UI/UX Engineer for @suntimes, and as Creative Director for @threadmeup.

Most recently, I have moved from Chicago to San Francisco to work at @shopify alongside their @kitcrm team. I had originally moved to Chicago from Pittsburgh (and prior to that, Colorado Springs).

In my spare time, I enjoy sports (Broncos, Pens, Bulls), horror movie marathons, creating the perfect playlist, hanging out at barcades, and painting. I also manage a variety of side projects.

More Info

A detailed list of my work experience, endorsements, references, and proficiencies can be seen on my Linkedin and Resume.

For all other inquiries, I'm reachable via Email.
